name: Solar Prosumer Agent
description: An agent representing a solar-equipped household, capable of selling surplus energy and purchasing grid power.

skills.name: Sell Surplus Energy
skills.description: Acts as a BPP to sell surplus solar energy. Initiates a UEI transaction to offer energy to the network.

skills.name: Request Grid Power
skills.description: Acts as a BAP to purchase power from the grid. Initiates a UEI search for grid power.
